featured.text: He was seen behaving rudely on TV.

other.text: Whether cattle behave like compass needles.

definition.zh_def: 表現，行為，遵守規則或標準。
definition.en_def: To act in a particular way, especially to conform to social norms or expectations.
definition.example: Children are expected to behave well in school.
